ordinarily, we'd work solely with bytes32, we need to truncate nodeValues up the tree.  Therefore, we need to declare certain variables with lower byte-lengths: LEAF_HASHLENGTH = 32 bytes; NODE_HASHLENGTH = 27 bytes; 5 byte difference * 8 bits per byte = 40 bit shift to truncate hashlengths. 27 bytes * 2 inputs to sha() = 54 byte input to sha(). 54 = 0x36. If in future you want to change the truncation values, search for '27', '40' and '0x36'."}}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/Users/sbacha/baseline-workspace/contracts/node_modules/@baseline-protocol/contracts/contracts/privacy/Shield.sol":"Shield"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/Users/sbacha/baseline-workspace/contracts/node_modules/@baseline-protocol/contracts/contracts/privacy/IShield.sol":{"keccak256":"0x969add7bf464cfbca9791cbad9b4745fff556d6f8f7fbe573e2cae5d2f73a4e2","license":"CC0","urls":["bzz-raw://49afdd63b89e55eb09238639fb2f09291b74b6617b35f017e55d90072a4d4896","dweb:/ipfs/QmXzsAMjivakjfsCyK9xV2aek8uzJoP3SfvxqTAkggnxSN"]},"/Users/sbacha/baseline-workspace/contracts/node_modules/@baseline-protocol/contracts/contracts/privacy/IVerifier.sol":{"keccak256":"0xcb156c4b29785cf5306e87f728c0b2d9ba8a48269deaa1bd2eac2e9c2c45ff4a","license":"CC0","urls":["bzz-raw://312b68614eba1c6326e6908b2ade7cd44f65c8267b461eae880ab4aebf709540","dweb:/ipfs/QmRCLTWjTo4UGHYVhhDJBM4Gd65Uet5axTbcKcXTb8Ked8"]},"/Users/sbacha/baseline-workspace/contracts/node_modules/@baseline-protocol/contracts/contracts/privacy/Shield.sol":{"keccak256":"0x6d1b2a229683e98f3bca896234e206dd4b871b08fdcbcdb96c27e20ead7c9781","license":"CC0","urls":["bzz-raw://ce0f249973d61452f0555f055e7479d75e7e251ce0cb32082061262987020a1c","dweb:/ipfs/QmZn9iiPniRA5eRajYdmr89wiRiLA4kMisLm4uco1sQo64"]},"/Users/sbacha/baseline-workspace/contracts/node_modules/@baseline-protocol/contracts/contracts/privacy/lib/MerkleTreeSHA256.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf36517b38ac679594347ff680fe830ece72fc937eee6f91b14dbade4202e7f63","license":"CC0","urls":["bzz-raw://0c570b01a27e1ac3a69819966b89e27a2926c5321766e27045d6602be2e2de58","dweb:/ipfs/QmNqTdzmUFVxUDfcnpB8nFnvwSGBjP5GxyvRPt1oAqCZ87"]}},"version":1}

zero().notice: Whilst ordinarily, we'd work solely with bytes32, we need to truncate nodeValues up the tree.  Therefore, we need to declare certain variables with lower byte-lengths: LEAF_HASHLENGTH = 32 bytes; NODE_HASHLENGTH = 27 bytes; 5 byte difference * 8 bits per byte = 40 bit shift to truncate hashlengths. 27 bytes * 2 inputs to sha() = 54 byte input to sha(). 54 = 0x36. If in future you want to change the truncation values, search for '27', '40' and '0x36'.
